questions.question: What type of network does the blockchain work on?
options: A) Public Network
B) Private Network
C) Hybrid Network
D) Decentralized Network

questions.question: What is the purpose of a Content Delivery Network (CDN)?
options: A) To improve website security
B) To reduce latency and increase speed
C) To enhance user experience
D) To optimize server performance

questions.question: What is the difference between HTTP and HTTPS?
options: A) HTTP uses encryption, HTTPS does not
B) HTTPS uses encryption, HTTP does not
C) Both use encryption
D) Neither uses encryption

questions.question: What is a good practice for error handling in web development?
options: A) Raising exceptions and letting the server crash
B) Returning an error message to the client
C) Logging errors and continuing execution
D) Ignoring errors and continuing execution

questions.question: What is the importance of input validation in web development?
options: A) Improving website security
B) Reducing server load
C) Enhancing user experience
D) Increasing website speed

questions.question: What is a good practice for password storage?
options: A) Storing passwords in plain text
B) Using weak hashing algorithms
C) Using weak salting techniques
D) Using strong hashing and salting

questions.question: What is the difference between a GET and POST request?
options: A) GET requests are used for form submissions, POST requests are not
B) POST requests are used for form submissions, GET requests are not
C) Both GET and POST requests can be used for form submissions
D) Neither GET nor POST requests can be used for form submissions

questions.question: What is a good practice for caching in web development?
options: A) Caching all data, regardless of relevance
B) Caching frequently accessed data only
C) Ignoring caching altogether
D) Using caching to improve server performance

questions.question: What is the importance of keeping software up-to-date?
options: A) Improving website security
B) Reducing server load
C) Enhancing user experience
D) Increasing website speed

questions.question: What is a good practice for debugging in web development?
options: A) Ignoring errors and continuing execution
B) Logging errors but not fixing them
C) Fixing errors as soon as possible
D) Using debugging tools to identify issues
